welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saugus, where small-town charm meets rich history. Known for its iconic ironworks and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
